DataElement.preferredName: Disease or Disorder Present Current Curative Intent Therapeutic Procedure Administration Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Ind
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A response to questions which are necessary to allow clinical study participation, as outlined in the study protocol, to address the patient's existing disease and the current administration of therapy with curative intent.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Disease or Disorder Present Current Cure Intent Therapeutic Procedure Administration Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function._Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time._Occurring in or belonging to the present time._Serving or tending to restore health; a remedy._An anticipated outcome that is the purpose for actions taken, thus guiding the action._An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process._The act of the dispensing, applying, or tendering of something to another, such as administration of a medicine._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A definite pathologic process with a characteristic set of signs and symptoms. It may affect the whole body or any of its parts, and its etiology, pathology, and prognosis may be known or unknown.

Concepts.definition: Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function.

Property.preferredName: Present Current Cure Intent Therapeutic Procedure Administration Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
Property.preferredDefinition: Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.:Occurring in or belonging to the present time.:Serving or tending to restore health; a remedy.:An anticipated outcome that is the purpose for actions taken, thus guiding the action.:An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.:The act of the dispensing, applying, or tendering of something to another, such as administration of a medicine.:Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

Concepts.definition: Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.
Occurring in or belonging to the present time.
Serving or tending to restore health; a remedy.
An anticipated outcome that is the purpose for actions taken, thus guiding the action.
An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.
The act of the dispensing, applying, or tendering of something to another, such as administration of a medicine.
Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

DataElementConcept.origin: ACRIN:American College of Radiology Imaging Network

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ReferenceDocuments.name: Does the patient have Stage I
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have Stage I, II, or III disease at time of enrollment and are being treated with curative-intent?

DataElement.origin: ACRIN:American College of Radiology Imaging Network
